media:group.media:title: From Sphericons to Countdown dice
media:group.media:description:
How we made a better countdown/spindown die, inspired by sphericons.
Countdown d24: https://www.mathartfun.com/thedicelab.com/CountdownD24.html

Thanks to Alexandre Muñiz for the idea to make a countdown die based on a sphericon.

My article on Rolling Acrobatic Apparatus:
https://www.ams.org/journals/notices/202107/rnoti-p1106.pdf

You can 3D print your own sphericon and three-cone sphericon:
https://www.printables.com/model/177077-sphericon
https://www.printables.com/model/177213-three-cone-sphericon
